plugin-data.name: RSS Feed 2
plugin-data.description:
Creates an RSS web syndication feed of your site.
URL: http://example.com/feed.rss

rss-feed-copyright-tip:
More information about copyright licenses.
Default: DISABLE. Current:
rss-feed-generator-tip:
A string indicating the program used to generate the RSS feed.
Default: "Bludit - Flat-File CMS". Leave blank to disable.
rss-feed-item-limit-tip:
Maximum number of items in RSS feed.
Default: "10". "-1" will output ALL pages.
rss-feed-ttl-tip:
Number of minutes before feed reader refreshes RSS feed.
Default: "60" (recommended). Select "0" to disable. More information about ttl.
rss-feed-url-tip: URL that people use to subscribe to your RSS feed.
